data: Provider to enter time of discharge: Discharge Home at:
Do not discharge patient until radiologist / MRP has seen patient
Give Patient information pamphlet on discharge if applicable
Immediately if new onset of headache, mental changes, motor or sensory abnormalities, or if seizure occurs
Assess right extremity q15min for 1 hour, q30min for 1 hour and q60min for 3 hour
Assess left extremity q15min for 1 hour, q30min for 1 hour and q60min for 3 hour
Right lower extremity, q1h, while sheath in situ
Left upper extremity, q1h, while sheath in situ
Strict bedrest x 4 hour then activity as tolerated
Bedrest x 2 hour then activity as tolerated
Keep Right Leg straight while on bedrest x 2 hour post sheath removal, then activity as tolerated. May raise head of bed up to 10 degrees
Keep Right Leg straight while on bedrest x 4 hour post sheath removal, then activity as tolerated. May raise head of bed up to 10 degrees
Keep Left Leg straight while on bedrest x 2 hour post sheath removal, then activity as tolerated. May raise head of bed up to 10 degrees
Keep Left Leg straight while on bedrest x 4 hour post sheath removal, then activity as tolerated. May raise head of bed up to 10 degrees
Start: Clear Fluid Diet, Adjust/Advance Diet to: General Diet, RN or RD to place subsequent diet orders
Start: Other (Please Specify), Adjust/Advance Diet to: General Diet, Sips of fluids for 2 hours, RN or RD to place subsequent diet orders
Start: NPO, NPO except with medications (PO or through NG/Enteral), RN or RD to place subsequent diet order to resume at 0800
